product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Battery, Micro USB Charger, Quick Start Guide
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty for Device and 6 Months Manufacturer Warranty for In-box Accessories Including Batteries from the Date of Purchase
product_specification.Warranty Service Type: Customer can call at 1800 1028 169 for customer support for further information and For damage/repair services customer can visit to nearest services centre

product_description.Hassle-free Usage: This phone is an easy one to handle, as its design makes it easy to dial and text. This phone features a 6.09 cm (2.4) screen and ergonomically designed keys.
product_description.Music: Feeling bored? You can tune-in to your favourite channel with this phone’s wireless FM radio. Oh! And you can play the radio with or without a headset. You can also play your preferred tunes using the MP3 player.
product_description.Battery: This phone’s battery will ensure that you get to go about your day for a long time. When the charge is low, you can plug-in the universal micro-USB charger to charge it.
product_description.Camera Features: Featuring the VGA camera with flash, this phone will help you capture images easily. You can also share these photos with your loved obes via Bluetooth.
product_description.Durable Polycarbonate: This phone’s exterior is made from high-quality, durable polycarbonate, thereby making it strong and durable.
product_description.Play Games: The classic Snake Xenzia game on this phone will keep you engrossed for hours. You can also find other great games and beat boredom.

Good Product Bt Battery Capacity Low

Everything is ok.
Call connection and calling is very good.
Sound quality is good.
Also camera is ok.
Wireless FM radio is perfect with good sound quality.

But.
Due to insufficient in build memory, camera can't get any picture to save. Also can't store any song on inbuilt phone memory.

So memory card is essential for this phone.

After all holding grip is fine.
Buttons are so hardy.
Phone is very solid in quality.
